summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-Powered Mock Interview Platform MVP. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI flows functional with one timer issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Timer starts at 0:00 instead of allocated time, causing immediate textarea disable
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot answer questions as textarea is disabled immediately

passed_tests: Resume upload and AI parsing (PDF/DOCX/TXT support)
Interview start and first question generation
Answer textarea and submit button functionality
AI question generation with proper difficulty levels
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix timer initialization issue in InterviewPage.js - timer starts at 0:00 instead of question's allocated time, preventing users from answering questions
